item.description:
Please join us for a fun afternoon making seedballs and tossing them about! We'll also have a discussion about guerilla gardening and how we can add some valuable plants and create more diversity in neglected areas near our homes.

I will have lots of herb and wildflower seeds and the rest of the seedball material. Please bring along any extra perennial seeds that you might have and we'll use some of them too!

The loose agenda:
1:00- Meet and greet
1:15- Start making the seedballs
2:00- Guerilla gardening discussion and planning where to toss the seeds
3:00- Head out and drop some seed bombs

Please bring snack to share with the group and any perennial herb or wildflower seeds you might have to spare.
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the front door on the porch and we'll let you in
item.name: Seedballs and Guerrilla Gardening
